document.full_text: a plastic bag of trash found in casey anthony's car trunk took center stage on tuesday at her first-degree murder trial for allegedly killing her 2-year-old daughter caylee.
document.title: plastic bag of trash features in casey anthony trial
lines_and_colors: a plastic bag of trash found in casey anthony's car trunk took center stage on tuesday at her first-degree murder trial for allegedly killing her 2-year-old daughter caylee.
